user_query: I want to surprise my sister with a unique gift for her graduation. Can you give me a random fact about the number 2021? Also, I need to know the exchange rate from EUR to USD to determine the budget for her gift. Furthermore, please provide me with the stats of her favorite basketball team.

TaskList.description: Get a random fact about the number 2021.
Retrieve the current exchange rate from EUR to USD.
Fetch stats for the user's favorite basketball team.
